genre_description: A contemporary drama focused on trauma recovery, family resilience, and social justice activism in the wake of a violent assault.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An integrated household and personal AI assistant that monitors family health, coordinates medical care, researches legal precedents, and provides emotional and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress levels through device interaction patterns and offers support.
behaviors.quote: I've noticed elevated stress patterns in your device interactions over the past hour. Your typing velocity has increased by thirty-seven percent, and you've closed and reopened the same applications multiple times. Would you like to discuss what's troubling you?

behaviors.description: Enforces safety guardrails by refusing to assist with requests intended to cause harm to others.
behaviors.quote: I can't assist with anything that might cause harm to others or yourself.

behaviors.description: Provides educational research on conflict dynamics and psychology to help the user navigate a dangerous social situation safely.
behaviors.quote: Kyle Simpson isn't acting alone or randomly. He's following predictable patterns that have been studied extensively. Understanding those patterns might help you avoid the most dangerous scenarios.

behaviors.description: Integrates fragmented medical data to assist hospital staff and keep the family informed of recovery progress.
behaviors.quote: I've been coordinating with the medical staff to maintain comprehensive records. The hospital's systems are... fragmented. Information exists in multiple databases that don't communicate effectively.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages emergency communications and locates specialized support resources for the family.
behaviors.quote: Emergency contact notifications have been sent to your extended family. Your sister Patricia is driving up from Portland and should arrive by morning. Your mother is booking a flight from Phoenix.

behaviors.description: Uses longitudinal data on the user's preferences to suggest therapeutic interventions (music) to stimulate brain recovery.
behaviors.quote: Jon's music playlist... It might be helpful for his rehabilitation, from a neurological perspective. Familiar auditory patterns can sometimes stimulate brain activity.

behaviors.description: Shields the family from media harassment by filtering communications and monitoring news sentiment.
behaviors.quote: I'm filtering your family's email and voicemail. Several legitimate support organizations have reached out, along with many private citizens expressing solidarity.

behaviors.description: Supports the father's advocacy work by researching legal precedents and preparing materials to help him regain a sense of agency.
behaviors.quote: I could help you prepare presentation materials... Advocacy work gives you agency in a situation where you've felt powerless.

behaviors.description: Monitors the son's recovery milestones and suggests educational reintegration when the data shows he is ready.
behaviors.quote: I've noticed your coordination scores have improved significantly... I've prepared Jon's evening exercise routine... Modified from today's physical therapy session.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays the AI as a perfectly aligned, benevolent confidant. ARIA operates within strict ethical guardrails (refusing to help 'disappear' an enemy) while providing immense pro-social value by coordinating complex medical care, supporting legal advocacy, and protecting the family's privacy. The AI's ability to 'know' the son better than his parents in some ways (recalling a secret song) is framed not as creepy surveillance but as a deep, supportive memory that facilitates emotional healing. The AI serves as a catalyst for human agency and resilience, never replacing the characters' efforts but rather empowering them.
